item.title: Pandas练习_1
item.description: Ex1 - Getting and Knowing your Data This time we are going to pull data directly from the internet. Special thanks to: https://github.com/justmarkham for sharing the dataset and materials. Step 1. Import the necessary libraries / 导入必要的包 1 2 import pandas as pd import numpy as np Step 2. Import the dataset from this address . / 导入数据 Step 3. Assign it
